starts.title: Both players wink at each other dramatically
Both players take off their shoes
starts.extra: Also, invent a wacky handshake with your feet

examples.title: Both players take a big confident step toward each other and grin
examples.extra: Seal it with a held fist-bump for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players hype each other up loudly
examples.extra: Repeat the hype as a whisper from a foot away

examples.title: Both players high‑five and keep hands aloft together
examples.extra: Step closer and maintain eye contact for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players runway‑walk toward each other and stop close
examples.extra: Hold the pose and smile for a slow count of 3

examples.title: Both players play chicken walking straight at each other
examples.extra: Stop nose‑to‑nose without laughing

examples.title: Both players trade the boldest compliment you dare
examples.extra: Say a second, even bolder one from closer

examples.title: Both players pose back‑to‑back like action heroes
examples.extra: Hook elbows together and hold for 5 seconds

examples.title: Current player dips the other dramatically
examples.extra: Switch roles and dip even lower

examples.title: Both players state your names inches apart
examples.extra: Pause, smile, and step back together

examples.title: Both players whisper a secret while inching closer
examples.extra: Share a second secret from even closer

examples.title: Current player spins the other into a close pose
examples.extra: Finish with a brief hug for a slow count of 3

examples.title: Both players trade brisk shoulder-and-neck massages inches apart (over clothes)
examples.extra: Use massage oil

examples.title: Both players exchange quick kisses on the cheek
examples.extra: Add a soft forehead kiss if you both want to

examples.title: Both players swap an accessory (hat, scarf, jacket)
examples.extra: Wear it for the rest of the round

examples.title: Current player back‑hugs the other for 10 seconds (over clothes)
examples.extra: Whisper a bold compliment while holding

examples.title: Both players stand chest‑to‑chest and breathe slowly
examples.extra: Maintain closeness for a slow count of 10

examples.title: Both players dance boldly for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Finish cheek‑to‑cheek for 5 seconds

examples.title: Current player sits briefly on the other's lap (clothed) for a pose
examples.extra: Switch roles and hold for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players take a selfie shoulder‑to‑shoulder
examples.extra: Do a second take leaning chest‑to‑chest for 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players share a makeout session (fully clothed)
examples.extra: Pause to smile at each other between kisses

examples.title: Both players hold a chest‑to‑chest embrace with exploring hands (over clothes)
examples.extra: Maintain closeness for 30 seconds

examples.title: Both players share a tight straddle hug (clothed)
examples.extra: Rock slowly together for a slow count of 10

examples.title: Both players share your most passionate clothed makeout and embrace
examples.extra: Breathe together and hold each other for 30 seconds

examples.title: Both players trace fingertips on each other's forearms
examples.extra: Continue along shoulders (over clothes)

examples.title: Both players hold each other around the waist (clothed)
examples.extra: Pull a little closer for the last 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players play the near‑kiss game: stop a breath apart
examples.extra: Hold the pose for a slow count of 5

examples.title: Current player gives a clothed lap dance for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Seated player may place hands on shoulders or hips

examples.title: Both players outline each other's back and sides (over clothes)
examples.extra: Move slower and stand closer

examples.title: Both players remove each other's jacket or top layer
examples.extra: Stand closer and repeat the reveal

examples.title: Both players exchange shirts behind a barrier, then reveal
examples.extra: Model each other's look for 5 seconds
